name: Sraosha
title: Sraosha - Persian Mythology
subtitle: Yazata of Obedience and Divine Word
longDescription:
Yazata of Obedience and Divine Word

The divine messenger who protects souls, battles demons, and embodies righteous obedience to Ahura Mazda.
